TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewElementStates extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica el estado de la interfaz de usuario de un elemento situado dentro de un control .

span.span: Specifies the user interface (UI) state of a element within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Aunque estos distintos Estados, como congeladas, se aplican mediante la interfaz de usuario, se pueden reemplazar mediante programación.Although these different states, like Frozen, are enforced by the UI, they can be programmatically overruled. ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el uso de este tipo.The following code example illustrates the use of this type. Para obtener más información, consulte [Cómo: realizar una acción personalizada basándose en los cambios en una celda de un DataGridView Control de formularios Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/perform-a-custom-action-based-on-changes-in-a-cell-of-a-datagrid.md).For more information, see [How to: Perform a Custom Action Based on Changes in a Cell of a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/perform-a-custom-action-based-on-changes-in-a-cell-of-a-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#135](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#135)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#135](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#135)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates Displayed = int32(1)

summary.span: Indica que un elemento se está mostrando actualmente en la pantalla.

span.span: Indicates the an element is currently displayed onscreen.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates Frozen = int32(2)

summary.span: Indica que un elemento no se puede desplazar a través de la interfaz de usuario.

span.span: Indicates that an element cannot be scrolled through the UI.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates None = int32(0)

summary.span: Indica que un elemento está en su estado predeterminado.

span.span: Indicates that an element is in its default state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates ReadOnly = int32(4)

summary.span: Indica que un elemento no acepta las entradas de usuario para cambiar su valor.

span.span: Indicates that an element will not accept user input to change its value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates Resizable = int32(8)

summary.span: Indica que no se puede cambiar el tamaño de un elemento a través de la interfaz de usuario.

span.span: Indicates that an element can be resized through the UI.

summary.span: Este valor se omite excepto cuando se combina con el valor .

span.span: This value is ignored except when combined with the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates ResizableSet = int32(16)

summary.span: Indica que un elemento no hereda el estado de tamaño variable de su primario.

span.span: Indicates that an element does not inherit the resizable state of its parent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates Selected = int32(32)

summary.span: Indica que un elemento está en estado seleccionado (resaltado) de la interfaz de usuario.

span.span: Indicates that an element is in a selected (highlighted) UI state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates Visible = int32(64)

summary.span: Indica que un elemento es visible (que se puede mostrar).

span.span: Indicates that an element is visible (displayable).
